verses.verse: As the deer <WH354> pants <WH6165> after the water <WH4325> brooks <WH650>, so pants <WH6165> my soul <WH5315> after you <WH430>, O God.
My soul <WH5315> thirsts <WH6770> for God <WH430>, for the living <WH2416> God <WH410>: when shall I come <WH935> and appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> God <WH430>?
My tears <WH1832> have been my food <WH3899> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, while they continually <WH3117> say <WH559> unto me <WH430>, Where is your God?

When I remember <WH2142> these things <WH8210>, I pour out my soul <WH5315> in me <WH5674>: for I had gone with the multitude <WH5519>, I went <WH1718> with them to the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, with the voice <WH6963> of joy <WH7440> and praise <WH8426>, with a multitude <WH1995> that kept holyday <WH2287>.

Why are you cast down <WH7817>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why are you disquieted <WH1993> in me <WH3176>? hope you in God <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> him for the help <WH3444> of his favor <WH6440>.

O my God <WH430>, my soul <WH5315> is cast down <WH7817> inside me <WH2142>: therefore will I remember you from the land <WH776> of Jordan <WH3383>, and of the Hermonites <WH2769>, from the hill <WH2022> Mizar <WH4706>.
Deep <WH8415> calls <WH7121> unto deep <WH8415> at the noise <WH6963> of your waterspouts <WH6794>: all your waves <WH4867> and your billows <WH1530> are gone over me <WH5674>.

Yet the Lord <WH3068> will command <WH6680> his lovingkindness <WH2617> in the daytime <WH3119>, and in the night <WH3915> his song <WH7892> shall be with me <WH8605>, and my prayer unto the God <WH410> of my life <WH2416>.
I will say <WH559> unto God <WH410> my rock <WH5553>, Why have you forgotten <WH7911> me <WH3212>? why go I mourning <WH6937> because of the oppression <WH3906> of the enemy <WH341>?
As with a sword <WH7524> in my bones <WH6106>, my enemies <WH6887> reproach <WH2778> me <WH559>; while they say daily <WH3117> unto me <WH430>, Where is your God?

Why are you cast down <WH7817>, O my soul <WH5315>? and why are you disquieted <WH1993> inside me <WH3176>? hope you in God <WH430>: for I shall yet praise <WH3034> him <WH3444>, who is the health of my favor <WH6440>, and my God <WH430>.
